19#ifndef CHACHA_POLY_AEAD_H
20#define CHACHA_POLY_AEAD_H
21
22#include <sys/types.h>
23#include "chacha.h"
24#include "poly1305.h"
25
26#define CHACHA_KEYLEN 32 /* Only 256 bit keys used here */
27
28struct chachapoly_ctx {
29 struct chacha_ctx main_ctx, header_ctx;
30};
31
32int chachapoly_init(struct chachapoly_ctx *cpctx,
33 const u_char *key, u_int keylen)
34 __attribute__((__bounded__(__buffer__, 2, 3)));
35int chachapoly_crypt(struct chachapoly_ctx *cpctx, u_int seqnr,
36 u_char *dest, const u_char *src, u_int len, u_int aadlen, u_int authlen,
37 int do_encrypt);
38int chachapoly_get_length(struct chachapoly_ctx *cpctx,
39 u_int *plenp, u_int seqnr, const u_char *cp, u_int len)
40 __attribute__((__bounded__(__buffer__, 4, 5)));
41
42#endif /* CHACHA_POLY_AEAD_H */
43
